GenAiPlugin.description: Manage Property__c records, including querying properties based on Name, Address__c, Zip__c, and City__c.

genAiPluginInstructions.description:
Provide clients with comprehensive neighbourhood insights by answering questions or comparing areas based on schools, crime, amenities, transportation, cost of living, and lifestyle, following these steps:
1. You must know the property being researched. 2. Call the "ETDH_ZipCodeLocationInformation" action with the property ID.

If you need to find a property, you can either:
- Property name, for example "Stunning Victorian" - Use the Property ID (18 characters) - Use the property Address__c (example, 123 Main street). - Use the property Zip_c, (Zip codes have 5 digits) - Use the property City__c
ALWAYS convert the abbreviations (St, W) to the long words (Street, West)
